content.rendered:
Caro-Bama BBQ and Curbside Chef will join us outside in a mini-foodtruck rodeo between Track 1 and the Soldering Tents. The B-Sides Orlando took time selecting trucks that provided a number of options for many dietary restrictions and tastes. Trucks will setup around 10am to get ready for lunch at noon.

If you have other dietary needs or are looking for other option within a five-minute walk of the venue on the Full Sail campus are the following options:
• Millers Ale House – Bar and Restaurant
• Aroogas – Bar and Restaurant with vegan burger option
• Chilis – National Chain Restaurant – Casual Dining
• McDonalds – Fast Food Burgers
• Taco Bell – Fast Food Tacos
• Fire House Subs – Fast Food Subs

If you leave the venue you will need to come through security again so plan your time accordingly.

Caro-Bama

Curbside Chef

Lineage Coffee
